description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省公安工作。
description.en: A component department of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China, responsible for public security work throughout the province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部
en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees public security nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会
en: Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese Communist Party in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 陕西省公安厅在业务上接受中华人民共和国公安部的领导。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security is operationally subordinate to the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省公安厅是陕西省人民政府的组成部门，在组织上接受其领导。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security is a component department of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government and is organizationally subordinate to it.

relationships.target: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 陕西省公安厅接受中国共产党陕西省委员会的领导。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Department of Public Security is subordinate to the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.
